CustomField.description: Used for representing the decoding rule of the multi-value picklist field type value. For example, an auto insurance liability could be represented as 100/300/50 (per person/ per incident/ property). Such special values should be broken down into value and value decoder, ‘100/300/50' should be saved in the Value (Value__c) and the decoding rule 'per person/ per incident/ property’ should be stored in the Value Decoder (ValueDecoder__c).
CustomField.label: Value Decoder
